duration_in_months: Illegal to include in the formal Request for Federal Funds (Status Modification request)
full_summary:
### G9292-231843_B Stanchions
#### Contract Details

*  **Contract Title**: G9292-231843_B Stanchions  
*  **Reference Number**: WS3626268045-Doc3799458611  
*  **Status**: Expires
*  **Closing Date**: January 13, 2023, 2:00 PM EST  
*  **Amendment Number**: 3

#### Tender Information

*  **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal   
*  **Procurement Method**: Competitive  
*  **Procurement Category**: Goods  
*  **UNSPSC Code**: 46151505 - Barriers

#### Key Contract Details

*  **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)  
*  **End User Entity**: Department of Employment and Social Development (ESDC)
*  **Location**: Quebec (excluding NCR) 

#### Contact Information

*  **Name**: Jackson Hiltz  
*  **Email**: jackson.hiltz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca 
*  **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14960829?extsite=MTQ5NjA4MjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Bid Requirements 

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by **January 13, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST**. All bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number WS3626268045 (Doc3664436938), dated September 15, 2022, with a closing of October 3, 2022.

Stanchions in accordance with Annex A. This procurement is conditionally limited to Canadian goods. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. The specific requirements for stanchions conforming to Annex A are mandatory.  Barriers trade agreement is in place. A definitive Trade Agreement is applicable to this purchase.  This is an open bid opportunity. Bids received will be evaluated on the basis of the lowest price. Please note this is open bid solicitation. All responses must be in writing.

The end date for this contract is October 9, 202
